
	<h1 class="postTitle"><a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/xiannong/p/18759922" title="发布于 2025-03-23 17:58">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">picoctf general skills-easy 部分题目详解(1)</span>
    

</a>
</h1>
	<div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body cnblogs-markdown">
<h2 id="实验介绍">实验介绍：</h2>
<pre><code>ctf竞赛（Capture The Flag）是网络安全技术人员代替真实攻击，比拼技术的竞赛。
又名夺旗赛，是以拿到flag为目标的比赛。
</code></pre>
<p>picoctf上的题目比较适合新手练习。<br>
但是注册picoctf账号需要安装插件才能有人机验证，才能正常注册。<br>
<img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3382715/202503/3382715-20250323101945068-2056273119.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"><br>
插件的设置如图：<br>
<img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3382715/202503/3382715-20250323102054020-25434875.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 id="一">一：</h2>
<h4 id="1-lets-warm-up">1. Lets Warm Up</h4>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3382715/202503/3382715-20250308213157155-216045693.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"><br>
读题：一个字符在16进制中是0x70，那么在ASCII表中是什么？<br>
用ASCII表可以看出来0x70的字符是p<br>
<img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3382715/202503/3382715-20250308214844318-200403019.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"><br>
答案有固定的格式picoCTF{}，这个在左边的提示中提到。<br>
<img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3382715/202503/3382715-20250323102520895-1593918502.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>答案是picoCTF{p}</p>
<h4 id="2strings-it">2.strings it</h4>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3382715/202503/3382715-20250308220422892-1842160548.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"><br>
复制链接<br>
<img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3382715/202503/3382715-20250308222640089-101542729.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"><br>
双击右上角的picoctf自带的做题工具<br>
<img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3382715/202503/3382715-20250323103659764-1918946302.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>wget 黏贴链接<br>
<img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3382715/202503/3382715-20250308220203075-1728163665.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"><br>
picoCTF{5tRIng5_1T_d66c7bb7}</p>
<h4 id="3whats-a-net-cat">3.what's a net cat?</h4>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3382715/202503/3382715-20250308220641221-920207173.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"><br>
<img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3382715/202503/3382715-20250323103809347-204864634.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>picoCTF{nEtCat_Mast3ry_d0c64587}</p>
<h4 id="42warm">4.2Warm</h4>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3382715/202503/3382715-20250308221003620-907203634.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"><br>
将42转换成2进制即可，不需要前面的0，最终的二进制表示为101010<br>
<img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3382715/202503/3382715-20250308221311340-144779272.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<h4 id="5bases">5.Bases</h4>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3382715/202503/3382715-20250308222357674-473714679.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"><br>
使用CyberChef得到旗帜<br>
<img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3382715/202503/3382715-20250308222449395-1184477919.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"><br>
picoCTF{l3arn_th3_r0p35}</p>
<h4 id="6first-grep">6.First Grep</h4>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3382715/202503/3382715-20250323103543179-1361688547.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"><br>
和第二题一样方法<br>
picoCTF{grep_is_good_to_find_things_5af9d829}</p>
<h4 id="7magikarp-ground-missio">7.Magikarp Ground Missio</h4>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3382715/202503/3382715-20250323105125157-488226884.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"><br>
<img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3382715/202503/3382715-20250323105230314-1953679895.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"><br>
<img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3382715/202503/3382715-20250323110026118-425576377.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"><br>
flag放在主机文本文件里面，分成了三段<br>
<img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3382715/202503/3382715-20250323110322638-497705558.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"><br>
拼起来即可：<br>
picoCTF{xxsh_0ut_0f_//4t3r_5190b070}</p>
<h4 id="8nice-netcat">8.Nice netcat...</h4>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3382715/202503/3382715-20250323110818818-1638616792.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3382715/202503/3382715-20250323111609583-31695505.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"><br>
连接发现一串数字，这串数字的特征是不超过127，我猜这串数字可以转换成ASCII编码。<br>
<img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3382715/202503/3382715-20250323112024415-985355617.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"><br>
picoCTF{g00d_k1tty!_n1c3_k1tty!_7c0821f5}</p>
<h4 id="9obedient-cat">9.Obedient Cat</h4>
<p>太简单了<br>
picoCTF{s4n1ty_v3r1f13d_28e8376d}</p>
<h4 id="10python-wrangling">10.Python Wrangling</h4>
<p>先下载三个文件，尝试执行py文件看见提示，查看py文件<br>
<img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3382715/202503/3382715-20250323113853108-249746702.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"><br>
按照代码和提示确定使用-d，密码打开pw文本文件获得。<br>
<img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3382715/202503/3382715-20250323114214831-1441058674.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"><br>
picoCTF{4p0110_1n_7h3_h0us3_aa821c16}</p>
<h4 id="11static-aint-always-noise">11.Static ain't always noise</h4>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3382715/202503/3382715-20250323122419132-1971899517.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"><br>
把两个文件下载，sh执行sh文件，发现提示，按提示执行<br>
<img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3382715/202503/3382715-20250323124028642-1207352567.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"><br>
picoCTF{d15a5m_t34s3r_f5aeda17}</p>
<h4 id="12tab-tab-attack">12.Tab, Tab, Attack</h4>
<p>下载之后解压，进入最后的目录<br>
<img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3382715/202503/3382715-20250323175536820-93260727.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"><br>
<img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3382715/202503/3382715-20250323175744992-1101107649.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"><br>
picoCTF{l3v3l_up!_t4k3_4_r35t!_524e3dc4}</p>

</div>
